title: No. 670 (chair),  No. 671 (ottoman)
medium: Rosewood, leather, metal, upholstered cushions (filled with down, duck feathers, foam)
description: Lounge chair composed of three molded plywood shells, covered on their upper sides with leather-upholstered cushioning.  The armrests are also padded with foam and covered in leather.  The chair and ottoman rest on cast aluminum swivel bases with polished and matte black surfaces; the aluminum back braces are finished in the same way.
name: Chair and ottoman
